name: Blunthorn Rhino
description:
A distant relation of Natlan's Long-Necked Rhinos, though this claim may be hard to believe at first glance...
Blunthorn Rhinos are almost entirely covered in hardened corneum strata, and the hardest section of this corneal spine can even react to kuuvahki.
They are mostly gentle creatures, but if threatened, they will fight obstinately â€” and when that moment comes, their attackers will find that they are neither as ponderous nor as clumsy as they first appear.
